Class Payslip

java.lang.Object
Payslip
public class Payslip extends Object

Payslip Generator

Generates the details for a payslip and calculates all deductions and tax.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Payslip(String name, double gross_pay, double year_to_date, boolean unite)
    Constructs a payslip given the gorss pay, year to date, and whether the person is a union member.
    Payslip(String name, double grossPay, double net, double paye, double prsi, double usc, double health, double union)
    Constructs a payslip given all variables for the payslip, no calculations are made.

  • Constructor Details

    • Payslip

      public Payslip(String name, double gross_pay, double year_to_date, boolean unite)
      Constructs a payslip given the gorss pay, year to date, and whether the person is a union member.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the employee on the payslip.
      gross_pay - The gross pay (pay before all deductions) for the payslip.
      year_to_date - The gross earnings of the employee for the year to date.
      unite - Is the employee a member of the union i.e. "Unite"?

    • Payslip

      public Payslip(String name, double grossPay, double net, double paye, double prsi, double usc, double health, double union)
      Constructs a payslip given all variables for the payslip, no calculations are made.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the employee on the payslip.
      grossPay - The gorss pay for the payslip.
      net - The pay after deductions for the payslip.
      paye - The PAYE tax amount in euros.
      prsi - The PRSI tax amount in euros
      usc - The USC tax amount in euros.
      health - Health insurance deductible in euros.
      union - Union deductible in euros.

  • Method Details

    • paye

      public void paye()
      Calculates the PAYE tax.

    • prsi

      public void prsi()
      Calculates the PRSI tax.

    • usc

      public void usc()
      Calculates the USC tax.

      public void health()
      Calculates the health insurance payment.

      public void union()
      Calcualtes the union payment.

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      Prints the details of the payslip.

    • year_to_date

      public double year_to_date()
      Returns:
      Returns the gross pay to date.

    • save

      public void save() throws FileNotFoundException
      Saves the payslip to the CSV file.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - where the CSV for payslips is not found.

    • isOctober

      public static void isOctober() throws FileNotFoundException
      Checks if it is the 1st of October for salary scale point movement and runs Employee.addPoint() if it is.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException
